question: In the projectile motion of a particle on a level ground, which of the following remains constant with reference to time and position?
choices: Average velocity between any two points on the path
Angle between the instantaneous velocity with the horizontal
Vertical component of the velocity of the projectile
explanation: In projectile motion (neglecting air resistance), there is no acceleration in the horizontal direction ($a_x = 0$).
Therefore, the horizontal component of velocity ($u \cos \theta$) remains constant throughout the flight.
